Module it.polimi.ingsw2020.santorini
Package it.polimi.ingsw2020.santorini.view

Interface ViewInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppGUI, CLI
public interface ViewInterface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Apollo's power.

    the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Ares's power. the Parameter asked is direction of the cell where the demolition will occur If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again.

    method that gives the welcome to the clients and distributes color of the builders and Gods'cards metodo in cui si da il welcome alla partita, vengono assegnate le carte e i colori.

    the method asks to the player if he wants to activate his god's power
    void updateMatch​(UpdateMessage message)
    method that update the board every time that the model is modified, it does that by calling other methods metodo che aggiorna la board ogni volta che viene fatta una mossa (modificato il model) parametro un messaggio con scritte le informazioni sulla board.

  • Method Details

    • displaySetupWindow

      void displaySetupWindow​(boolean firstTime)
      method in which it's asked to the client to insert server's IP, and after that the username, birth date and type of match(number of players) metodo in cui si chiede l'iP del server, dopodichè di fanno inserire username, data di nascita e tipo di partita (numero di giocatori nella partita)
      Parameters:
      firstTime - is true if it is the first time we call the method is false if the username is unavailable, and ask the client a new username

    • displayLoadingWindow

      void displayLoadingWindow​(java.lang.String message)
      method that display a Loading window to the client while the server waits other clients to join metodo per intrattenere l'utente mentre aspettiamo altri utenti che vogliono giocare
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing all the infos needed to the method

    • displayMatchSetupWindow

      void displayMatchSetupWindow​(MatchSetupMessage matchSetupMessage)
      method that gives the welcome to the clients and distributes color of the builders and Gods'cards metodo in cui si da il welcome alla partita, vengono assegnate le carte e i colori. viene visualizzata una board semplificata per facilitare il posizionamento delle pedine
      Parameters:
      matchSetupMessage - the message containing all the infos needed to the method

    • displayGodSelectionWindow

      void displayGodSelectionWindow​(MatchSetupMessage matchSetupMessage)
      method that asks to the current player to choose which want he wants to his side
      Parameters:
      matchSetupMessage - contains all the information needed to perform this choice

    • displaySelectionBuilderWindow

      void displaySelectionBuilderWindow​(MatchStateMessage matchStateMessage)
      the method aks to the current player to choose where he wants to place the builders in the board. This method will be called only in the setup phase metodo addetto alla selezione dei builder secondo l'ordine definito dal controller
      Parameters:
      matchStateMessage - contains all the references to the current player, the match and the board

    • displayNewSelectionBuilderWindow

      void displayNewSelectionBuilderWindow​(IllegalPositionMessage message)
      the method will be called only if a player will insert wrong parameters in displaySelectionBuilderWindow, and will ask to the player to insert them again.
      Parameters:
      message - contains the username of the player that has made the mistake and also a boolean that indicates which builder has the wrong coordinates

    • updateMatch

      void updateMatch​(UpdateMessage message)
      method that update the board every time that the model is modified, it does that by calling other methods metodo che aggiorna la board ogni volta che viene fatta una mossa (modificato il model) parametro un messaggio con scritte le informazioni sulla board.
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing all the infos needed to the method

    • displayStartTurn

      void displayStartTurn​(UpdateMessage message)
      method that shows board, builders, the textual interface and the first player to play far visualizzare la board con le pedine e tutta l'interfaccia testuale e il primo giocatore che gioca
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing all the infos needed to the method

    • displayWouldActivate

      void displayWouldActivate​(MatchStateMessage question)
      the method asks to the player if he wants to activate his god's power
      Parameters:
      question - is a message that contains the name of the player (that will receive the question) and the name of the god

    • displayParametersSelection

      void displayParametersSelection​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method calls a method linked to a specific God that will ask to the player to insert parameters needed to use the god
      Parameters:
      message - is a message that contains the name of the player (that will receive the question) and the name of the god

    • displaySP

      void displaySP​(UpdateMessage updateMessage, PhaseType phase)
      the method prints to the players when and which god helped a player
      Parameters:
      updateMessage - contains the name of the god used and the user name of the player that used it
      phase - is the phase in which the god helped the player

    • displayChooseBuilder

      void displayChooseBuilder​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player which one of his builder he wants to move and build with. To help the player in his choice the method also shows the board in its current state and it allows the player to select a builder only if he or she can move
      Parameters:
      message - contains the username of the player and

    • displayPossibleMoves

      void displayPossibleMoves​(AskMoveSelectionMessage message)
      the method asks to the player in which direction he wants to move the builder. The method shows a little matrix to represents the allowed direction of movements. If the player inserts a wrong direction, he will be asked again to insert the direction metodo che mostra all'utente le possibili mosse che il builder selezionato può fare
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing all the infos needed to the method

    • displayMoveUpdate

      void displayMoveUpdate​(UpdateMessage updateMessage)
      the method shows to the current player the board after the movement.
      Parameters:
      updateMessage - contains the username of current player and also a reference to the board(used to show the board to the player).

    • displayPossibleBuildings

      void displayPossibleBuildings​(AskBuildSelectionMessage message)
      the method asks to the player in which direction he wants to build. The method shows a little matrix to represents the allowed direction to construct near his playing builder. If the player inserts a wrong direction, he will be asked again to insert the direction metodo che mostra all'utente le possibili costruzioni che il builder mosso può fare
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing all the infos needed to the method

    • displayBuildUpdate

      void displayBuildUpdate​(UpdateMessage updateMessage)
      the method shows the board updated after the build phase
      Parameters:
      updateMessage - is a message that contains the reference to the board, which is used to print the board itself

    • displayEndTurn

      void displayEndTurn​(UpdateMessage updateMessage)
      the method prints a message to the players showing how the board has been modified during the turn and communicates the end of the turn of the current player
      Parameters:
      updateMessage - contains the the user name of current player and the reference to the board

    • displayEndMatch

      void displayEndMatch​(java.lang.String winner)
      method that shows winner. It then close the match or if the players wants to begin a new match metodo che mostra vincitori e vinti. conclude la partita con epic sax guy
      Parameters:
      winner - the winner of the match

    • displayErrorMessage

      void displayErrorMessage​(java.lang.String error)
      method that shows possible errors occurred metodo che mostra all'utente possibili errori che sono capitati
      Parameters:
      error - the message error to display

    • displayApolloParamSel

      ApolloParamMessage displayApolloParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Apollo's power. These parameters are the choice of which builder the player want to move (and swap with opponent's builder) and in which direction. If the builder selected cannot be moved, the method will choose for the player the other builder. If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains references about the board and the currents player(About the match ).
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameters gathered.

    • displayAresParamSel

      AresParamMessage displayAresParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Ares's power. the Parameter asked is direction of the cell where the demolition will occur If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains information about the match such as the current player
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameter insert by the player

    • displayArtemisParamSel

      ArtemisParamMessage displayArtemisParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Artemis's power. The Parameter asked is direction of the cell where the player wants to moved again the builder in. If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains information about the match such as the current player, information used for acquiring which is the playing builder
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameter acquired by the method

    • displayAtlasParamSel

      AtlasParamMessage displayAtlasParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Atlas's power. the Parameter asked is direction of the cell where the dome will be built If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains information about the match such as the current player, information used for acquiring which is the playing builder
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameter acquired by the method

    • displayDemeterParamSel

      DemeterParamMessage displayDemeterParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      The method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Demeter's power. The Parameter asked is direction of the cell where the player wants to build again the builder in. If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains information about the match such as the current player, information used for acquiring which is the playing builder
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameter acquired by the method

    • displayHestiaParamSel

      HestiaParamMessage displayHestiaParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Hestia's power. The Parameter asked is direction of the cell where the player wants to moved again the builder in. If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains information about the match such as the current player, information used for acquiring which is the playing builder
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameter acquired by the method

    • displayMinotaurParamSel

      MinotaurParamMessage displayMinotaurParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Minotaur's power. These parameters are che choice of which builder the player want to move (and push opponent's builder) and in which direction. If the builder selected cannot be moved, the method will choose for the player the other builder. If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains references about the board and the currents player(About the match ).
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameters gathered.

    • displayPoseidonParamSel

      PoseidonParamMessage displayPoseidonParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      The method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Poseidon's power. The Parameters asked are direction of the cell where the player wants to build again the builder in and how many times he wants to build. The method will display the max and min numbers of times he can build If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains information about the match such as the current player, information used for acquiring which is the playing builder
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameter acquired by the method

    • displayPrometheusParamSel

      PrometheusParamMessage displayPrometheusParamSel​(MatchStateMessage message)
      the method asks to the current player to insert parameters need to use Prometheus's power. These parameters are the choice of which builder the player want to build (the choice of the builder will be memorized to be used for the next phase of movement and building) and in which direction. If the builder selected cannot be moved, the method will choose for the player the other builder. If the direction insert is not allowed the method wil ask to the player to insert it again. The method will also built the message containing the parameters gathered
      Parameters:
      message - contains references about the board and the currents player(About the match ).
      Returns:
      the message containing the parameters gathered.
